title: Job No. 1112
creator_credit: Neil Howe, Dahl Collings, Geoffrey Collings and Collings Productions
brief_description: Describes the engineering design of the roof of the Sydney Opera House and the development of the architectural form of the roof from the original concept to its final realisation. Shows the construction of the roof with details of many special techniques developed to cope with its unusual building problems. Narrated by Ron Haddrick.
